basics.name: Emanuel Betancur Villamil
basics.label: Mechatronics Engineer
basics.summary: Mechatronics Engineer with experience in large-format 3D printer design, robotic educational platforms, and prototype development using CNC, SLA, and laser cutting. My graduation project focused on creating a resilient IoT weather station for extreme conditions and developing a dashboard for data interpretation.

work.name: Beta Machine Solutions LLC
work.summary: Acted as a technical representative, offering repair and maintenance for aesthetic lasers and biomedical equipment across the US.
highlights: Partnered with aesthetic equipment sales companies to customize products by analyzing and adapting engineering to new technologies.
Conducted quality assurance tests, analyzed laser spectra, and performed power/cooling evaluations on various laser systems (Diode, Nd:YAG, Er:YAG, CO2, IPL).

work.name: Improto 3D
work.summary: Led a team of 4 to design, manage, build, and calibrate the largest FDM printer in Medellín, Colombia. The project was completed in 3 months and the printer is currently used to produce sculptures and art for various galleries.
highlights: Led the team and supervised all technical aspects.
Made key decisions on technical features, ensuring the project met schedule and budget constraints.

work.name: Masmecanica
work.summary: Designed replacement parts for industrial and food processing equipment.
highlights: Created parts using CNC, SLA, and laser cutting.
Utilized 3D scanning to create and modify digital copies of industrial parts.
Programmed PLCs for food processing equipment.

work.name: Grupo Excala - Compañia de Empaques
work.summary: Contributed to the company's production processes in the agave and fique industry.
highlights: Led the design and development of double-fold sewing equipment for fique sacks in the coffee industry.
Implemented improvements to existing equipment, such as cone winders and spinning machines.

education.area: Mechatronics Engineering in Automation and Manufacturing

awards.title: Best robotic arm Scara
awards.summary: Winner of the best robotic arm Scara as an educational platform for the Digital Controller Design course.

publications.name: Development of weather station with IOT, redundant to failures and for high mountain environmental conditions
publications.summary: Developed a weather station platform and guide for creating remote systems, enabling automated acquisition of meteorological data for specialized studies in remote areas.
